item.title: My internship at superluminar
item.description: First day First meeting Becky and I first met at 8am to plan the rest of the day. I already had a lot of the programs I needed installed, so that part didn’t take long. The plan was for me to set up my own blog site using a framework called Hugo and summarize my first day as a blog. When I’m done with that, I could move on to React.
